name: CBATTRequest
desc: A request that uses the Attribute Protocol (ATT).

items.name: var central: CBCentral
items.desc: The remote central device that originated the request.

items.name: var characteristic: CBCharacteristic
items.desc: The characteristic to read or write the value of.

items.name: var value: Data?
items.desc: The data that the central reads from or writes to the peripheral.

items.name: var offset: Int
items.desc: The zero-based index of the first byte for the read or write request.
